sources.name: Medium Projection – UN Population Division (2015 revision)
sources.description:
Data published by UN Population Division (2015 revision) Medium Projection
Data publisher's source The UN Population Division is producing this projection.
Link https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/Download/Standard/Population/
Retrieved 2016-11-16

Total Population - Both Sexes. De facto population in a country, area or region as of 1 July of the year indicated.

The original dataset was presented in thousands.
